body.p:
Peach orchard Kentucky
December 18th 1862
H.. E..
Govenor Robinson
Dear Sir
We the undrrsigned are Commanders of Companies of Home Guards who are anctious to form ourselves into a Battallion of Cavaldry to do duty in the Sandy Valley and the border Counties

We are unanimus to a man that Lieutenant Jas D McBride now on officer in the Fifth Regiment Va Vol Infantry Shall be our commander and amediately take steps to organise the Battallion if this meets with your approveal

We are Your Most Obt Svts
Calvin Fuller
George W Murry
Ira G Copley
Marlin Maynard
David Batrim
John. W. Whitt
Z. Caldwell
